text: Stephen Coglin (14 October 1899 – 1965) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1965 deaths Category:People from Wolverhampton Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Moxley White Star F.C. players Category:Darlaston Town F.C. players Category:Lichfield City F.C. players Category:Wednesbury Old Athletic F.C. players Category:Willenhall F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Worcester City F.C. players Category:Hereford United F.C. players Category:Cannock Town F.C. players Category:Bromsgrove Rovers F.C. players Category:Archdales F.C. players Category:English Football League players
